Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/McLean
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Grand, Austin, North Ave, Ridgeland due to, street blockage near Narragansett/McLean.
